name: Hit Bounce!
description:
Hit Bounce! is a ping-pong game.
 

Let me explain how this game work.
First, you will see an animation of flying stars. While
this animation is running, you cannot exit or restart the game.
After the animation ends, you can exit (Esc) or restart (R)
the game.The main menu will also appear. To start the game,
you need to press the spacebar. Move the mouse left and right to
move the platform.

Optimal system requierments 

CPU: any
GPU: any/without
RAM: 512MB
Monitor: 60hz
Disk space: 3MB

Trial Version:

Since I want to get at least something
from my games, I made it paid. but also i created a
free version. It differs from the paid one in that the
screen contains the inscription "TRIAL" and the impossibility
of saving.
! IMPORTANT !The game saves the points in the previous game, not the High ScoreThe game is saved when you die, exit the game or restart it. If you exit the game using the Alt+F4 combination, the game will not be saved.
